overview: Featuring celebrity interviews with Martin Sheen, Ed Asner, Bob Newhart, and many more, this tell-all documentary examines a devoted yet stubborn priest who launched a national television show in the 1960s, but fell in love with a nun and subsequently had his show cancelled. Fr. Bud must engage with the sufferings of the poor before he can become a better priestâ€¦ and a better person.
title: Fr. Bud: Hollywood Priest
